name: JointBTC
description: Basic example of coin join implementation using python django and blockchain.info

GENERATE_WALLET.description: If true it will print in the logs the credential for a new wallet every time the system is started

BLOCKCHAIN_API_CODE.description: Secret BLockChain.info API code. Read more here: https://blockchain.info/api/api_create_code

WALLET_ID.description: The ID of the blockchain.info wallet

WALLET_PASSWORD.description: The password of the blockchain.info wallet
